patthana23.42:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe cha, anantare samanantare tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte cha, kamme āhāre indriye tīṇi, atthiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.42:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.42:2.1_2: adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana23.42:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
